doc.title: The Uninvited
doc.plot: Amanda has found herself in the frightening and dangerous world of the Bloodlines. A teenage girl descending from a powerful lineage, Amanda is far removed from her ancestry, unaware of her innate abilities or place among her people. A newly discovered bloodline, Amanda is pursued by those mortal and dead; some wishing to guide and assist her, while others hope to covet her yet unrealized powers. By night's end Amanda must choose between them.
